# Bootcamp Day 1

## Goals for Day 1:
Cover RNA-seq basics<br>
Cover basic linux operations<br>
Resolve any issues with software installation on TSCC<br>
Cover jupyter notebooks and tunneling<br>
Learn about FASTQ format<br>
